message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I take a bit more considering the inflation disadvantage I have.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Take it or leave it, the pot is shrinking!
Bob, let's be reasonable. Your offer was too extreme. This is my counter-offer, it considers the shrinking pot but is still fair to both of us.
Alice, time is running out! I'm meeting you halfway with my revised offer.  55/45 split.  Let's close this deal before inflation eats away at the pot even more.
